chapters.description: Overview of cybersecurity concepts, threats, vulnerabilities, and principles.
chapters.goal: Understand the basics of cybersecurity and its importance.

chapters.description: Learn about network protocols, firewalls, intrusion detection systems, and network security best practices.
chapters.goal: Understand how networks are secured and how to protect them from attacks.
chapters.mini_project: Set up a basic firewall on your home network.

chapters.description: Explore encryption algorithms, hashing techniques, digital signatures, and their applications in cybersecurity.
chapters.goal: Understand the principles of cryptography and how it is used to secure data.
chapters.mini_project: Implement a simple encryption/decryption algorithm in JavaScript.

chapters.description: Learn about common web application vulnerabilities (e.g., SQL injection, cross-site scripting), prevention techniques, and secure coding practices.
chapters.goal: Understand how to build secure web applications and protect them from attacks.
chapters.mini_project: Identify and fix security vulnerabilities in a simple web application.

chapters.description: Learn about API security best practices, authentication mechanisms, authorization techniques, and common API vulnerabilities.
chapters.goal: Understand how to secure APIs and protect them from unauthorized access and attacks.
chapters.mini_project: Implement API authentication and authorization using JWT.

chapters.description: Learn about specific security considerations when developing React applications, including state management, data validation, and preventing vulnerabilities like XSS and CSRF.
chapters.goal: Build secure React applications and avoid common security pitfalls.
chapters.mini_project: Build a secure React application with user authentication.

chapters.description: Learn about the phases of incident response (preparation, detection, containment, eradication, recovery, and post-incident review).
chapters.goal: Understand the steps involved in responding to a cybersecurity incident.
chapters.mini_project: Develop an incident response plan for your home network.

chapters.description: Learn about digital forensics techniques, evidence collection, analysis, and reporting.
chapters.goal: Understand how to investigate cybersecurity incidents and gather evidence.
chapters.mini_project: Simulate a data breach and practice evidence collection techniques.

chapters.description: Learn about the ethical principles of hacking, different types of penetration testing, and legal considerations.
chapters.goal: Understand the purpose and scope of ethical hacking.
chapters.mini_project: Set up a vulnerable virtual machine for practice.

chapters.description: Learn about network scanning tools (e.g., Nmap), port scanning, banner grabbing, and other techniques for gathering information about a target network.
chapters.goal: Develop skills in network reconnaissance and identifying potential vulnerabilities.
chapters.mini_project: Scan your own network for open ports and services.

chapters.description: Learn about common web application vulnerabilities (e.g., SQL injection, cross-site scripting) and techniques for exploiting them using tools like Burp Suite.
chapters.goal: Develop skills in identifying and exploiting web application vulnerabilities.
chapters.mini_project: Attempt to exploit a vulnerable web application (in a safe and ethical environment).
